attributes.review: This app literally destroyed my phone and killed me afterwards. It stole all of my belongings. I am scared. Literally the opposite of what Lady Gaga said. 0/10 Do NOT Recommend!!!
This app is horrible. The way that it is set up gives me headache and is so confusing. Not only that but I got bullied on there. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP😡🤬

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what the hype is all about then all of a sudden a scary creature that kind of resembled trump started chanting “TRUMP 2020”. As a vegan octopus I was very scared and offended by this. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS TERRIBLE APP!!!!!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE
